attributes.action: To ban any footballer seen as biting another player from playing professionally in both the UK and EU
attributes.additional_details: Luis Suarez, a football player employed by Liverpool Football Club, has been charged, and proven guilty, twice for biting fellow footballers. We call on the UK Government to ban the player from playing in the UK, to call on EUFA to ban him from playing in Europe, and for FIFA to ban him from professional football worldwide.
